title: The Portable Rapid Drink Chiller!
description: iPhone 7 Event discussion video -  SpinChill (USA Link) -  SpinChill (International) -   This contraption is called the Spin Chill. It's a handheld drink chiller that rapidly spins a can or bottle until it's ice cold. I've featured a similar product before that sits on your countertop, this one is cheaper and more portable.  From the manufacturer -  The SpinChill clips onto the top of the warm drink. It's then placed on ice and spins the drink, chilling it 20 times faster. Chilling Times: Beer/Soda cans: 1 minute Glass Bottles: 3-4 minutes Plastic Bottles: 3-4 minutes Wine/liquor: 5-7 minutes  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
